diabetes.name: Diabetes Management
diabetes.description: Low glycemic index, controlled carb intake

lunch: Lentil soup with whole grain bread

specialNotes: Eat fatty fish 2-3 times per week
Always check labels for hidden gluten
Get vitamin D from sun & supplements
Limit protein based on kidney function
